org.lwjgl.system

Interface FunctionProviderLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FunctionProvider, Retainable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FunctionProviderLocal.Default

    public interface FunctionProviderLocal
extends FunctionProvider
    A platform/device/context specific provider of native function addresses.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  FunctionProviderLocal.Default 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FunctionProviderLocal DUMMY
      A FunctionProviderLocal implementation that always returns NULL.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      long getFunctionAddress(long handle, java.lang.CharSequence functionName)
      Returns the function address of the specified function for the platform, device or context specified by handle.

    • Field Detail

      • DUMMY

        static final FunctionProviderLocal DUMMY
        A FunctionProviderLocal implementation that always returns NULL.

    • Method Detail

      • getFunctionAddress

        long getFunctionAddress(long handle,
                      java.lang.CharSequence functionName)
        Returns the function address of the specified function for the platform, device or context specified by handle. If the function is not supported, 0L is returned.
        Parameters:
        handle - the handle to a platform/device/context
        functionName - the function name to query
        Returns:
        the function address or 0L if the function is not supported
